creditline: Gift of the Clark Center for Japanese Art & Culture; formerly given to the Center by H. Ed Robison, in memory of his beloved wife Ulrike Pietzner Robison
description: white snow-covered mountain peaks in distance; pale orange sky; flat landscape in foreground with scattered trees and some water at front
medium: Woodblock print; ink and color on paper
signed: LRC below image, in pencil: [Toshi Yoshida]; LLC below image, in pencil: [Daisetsuzan]; LLC along left edge, in the image: [ 吉田 ]  {Yoshida}
title: Daisetsuzan
